headline: 3 Reasons to Buy AMD Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: The chipmaker is benefiting from the growing adoption of its AI chips in several areas.  Earnings growth is set to accelerate, which makes this stock a no-brainer buy in light of its valuation.  This has been a rough year for Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) investors so far, with shares of the chipmaker declining 18% in 2025, as of this writing, but the company's latest quarterly report indicates that investors may be making a mistake by not buying its shares in the wake of its pullback.

headline: This Week In AI Chips - AI Meets Blockchain: Revolutionizing On-Chain Gaming
summary: The recent launch of House of TEN marks a significant milestone in the world of AI chips and blockchain technology, showcasing the first fully on-chain poker platform with autonomous AI agents. This development highlights the convergence of AI-native iGaming and blockchain, addressing challenges around privacy, randomness, and autonomous processing without off-chain dependencies. Built on TEN's encrypted Layer 2, the platform offers a groundbreaking experience where AI agents engage in...

headline: AMD vs. Nvidia: Which Artificial Intelligence Stock Should You Buy on the Dip?
summary: Advanced Micro Devices and Nvidia are two chipmakers with a lot of potential growth ahead due to artificial intelligence.  Has the excitement surrounding artificial intelligence (AI) stocks cooled off?  Many top AI stocks are down this year, including Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD), better known as just AMD, and Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA).
